name: Together We Dig
description:
Dig together with your crew! Ancient hints lead you to treasure. Use as little crew as possible to gain a bigger cut! Try to collect all the unique artifacts! 

Mini Jame Gam #15 Submission

Theme: Together, Required Object: Shovel

Game Engine: Unity

Art: Aseprite, Midjourney

Audio: Chorme Music Lab Song Maker, Freesound.org
